query: Analyze how the implement skill has been performing - are users frequently editing its output and what patterns emerge?
expected_behavior: Claude reads .claude/feedback/edit-patterns.jsonl for the implement skill
Identifies recurring edit patterns with frequency and confidence scores
Reports success rate and usage count from metrics.json
Suggests improvements based on detected patterns with confidence thresholds

query: The last evolution update to the verify skill broke things - roll it back to the previous version
expected_behavior: Claude reads the version manifest from skills/verify/versions/manifest.json
Shows available version history with performance metrics per version
Creates a backup of the current version before restoring
Restores the previous version after user confirmation

query: Add a new endpoint to the users API that returns a list of active sessions
expected_behavior: Claude does NOT invoke the skill-evolution skill
Implements the API endpoint using standard backend patterns
Uses code editing tools rather than skill analytics tools
